briefTitle: Study of Favipiravir Compared to Standard of Care in Hospitalized Patients With COVID-19
officialTitle: Open-label Randomized Multicenter Comparative Study on the Efficacy and Safety of Areplivir Film-coated Tablets (PROMOMED RUS LLC, Russia) in Patients Hospitalized With COVID-19
summary: This is open-labe randomized multicenter comparative Phase III study conducted in 5 medical facilities. The objective of the study is to assess the efficacy and safety of Favipiravir compared with the Standard of care (SOC) in hospitalized patients with moderate COVID-19 pneumonia.
